name: Density Discrepencies
description:
Using only your mouse, click on the anomalies.

This is my first ever simple clicker. Hopefully I did the genre justice. There's no music because it is a clicker and I expect you will play this with your own tunes or a podcast or something.

Made with Unity DOTS

I spent less than 24 hours actually working on this project, so given that time I am happy with what I accomplished.
